trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<input type=hidden>" /> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático ao elemento <see langword="<input type=hidden>" /> HTML no servidor.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control to embed information that is hidden from the user within a `<form>` element.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle para inserir informações ocultas do usuário dentro de um `<form>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: This information is sent when the Web page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações são enviadas quando a página da Web é postada para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle fornece uma <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> evento que é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> valores entre postagens para o servidor de alterações de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você crie um manipulador de eventos que executa um conjunto personalizado de instruções de cada vez que o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle não fornece um modo interno para postar de volta para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> control, to send the value of the control back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Você deve fornecer outro controle na página da Web que oferece suporte ao envio para o servidor, como um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> controle, para enviar o valor do controle de volta para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework uses this HTML feature to automatically load and persist the view state of server controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura de página ASP.NET usa esse recurso HTML para carregar automaticamente e manter o estado de exibição de controles de servidor em uma página.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control to store information on the Web page between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle para armazenar informações na página da Web entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: The "hidden" literal string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres literal "oculta".

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control and place it on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controlar e colocá-lo na página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave do controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Processa os dados de postback para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o estado do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> tiver sido alterado como resultado do postback; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData%2A> method checks to see whether the postback value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control is different from the previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData%2A> método verifica se o valor de postback do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle é diferente do valor anterior e, em caso afirmativo, retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnPreRender%2A> method is called just prior to rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnPreRender%2A> método é chamado antes do processamento de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnPreRender%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnPreRender%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnPreRender%2A> method so that it applies HTML encoding to the input value in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> server control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnPreRender%2A> método para que ele se aplica a codificação HTML para o valor de entrada em um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange" />.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to handle the event directly.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite a você manipular o evento diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is changed on the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> propriedade é alterada no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> evento funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method to signal the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> para sinalizar ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> que o estado do controle foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle para estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contém o fluxo de saída que será renderizado no cliente.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> control's attributes to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza os atributos do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value" /> property is changed on the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value" /> é alterada no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is changed between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> propriedade é alterada entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> evento funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave do controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> interface method by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método de interface <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> chamando o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o estado do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden" /> tiver sido alterado como resultado do postback; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> interface method by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método de interface <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> chamando o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />.
